description: Try our easy to follow Mini Chicken & Leek Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mini Chicken & Leek Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220°C. Cut out 12 x 8cm-diameter circles from pastry for pie bases. Cut out 12 x 11cm-diameter circles for tops and place into the fridge to keep cool. Line a 12-hole medium muffin tin with larger pastry circles, pressing into the base and allowing the top edges to overhang. Fill with chicken mixture. Brush the pastry edges with a little egg. Top with smaller pastry circles and seal well, crimping the edges together. Brush tops with egg and cut slits in the top to allow steam to escape. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and crisp. Serve.

Preheat oven to 220°C. Cut out 12 x 8cm-diameter circles from pastry for pie bases. Cut out 12 x 11cm-diameter circles for tops and place into the fridge to keep cool. Line a 12-hole medium muffin tin with larger pastry circles, pressing into the base and allowing the top edges to overhang. Fill with chicken mixture. Brush the pastry edges with a little egg. Top with smaller pastry circles and seal well, crimping the edges together. Brush tops with egg and cut slits in the top to allow steam to escape. Bake for 25 minutes or until golden and crisp. Serve.
